items.title: Architecture
items.description: Designing (and implementing) distributed systems is one of my favorite tasks. Be it RESTful microservices with the occasionally interspersed SPA or IoT systems.

items.title: Software Engineering
items.description: I am passionate about high quality software development. In process, operations and code.

items.title: UX
items.description: Well implemented user experience design separates excellent from good software. I am knowledgable in human computer interaction. By education and vocational experience.

items.title: JavaScript
items.description:
— “If you cannot avoid it, you might as well embrace it.”

JavaScript is my bread and butter. No matter where – frontend, backend, jobs, tools, you name it. It is my personal default langauge to get things done. I code quite a lot. Not only at work, see my projects.

experteer.title: Senior Software Architect
experteer.name: Experteer
experteer.description: Software Architect and interim Frontend Team Lead in the Engineering Team. Creating system designs, implementing web services and single page applications for new products as well as transitioning the leacy system to a state-of-the-art web service architecture, cloud infrastructure and frontend technology stack.

osram.title: Application Architect & UX Responsible in R&D
osram.name: OSRAM
osram.description: Application Software Architect, UX Responsible and fullstack JavaScript engineer in the Smart Positioning Solutions research and development team. Design and implementation of location based services and IoT applications for OSRAM EINSTONE.

check24.title: Software Engineer

check24.description: Fullstack JavaScript developer and DevOps in the animal insurance team.
